email_body: Phillip, I am waiting to get info. on two more properties in San Antonio. The broker will be faxing info. on Monday. One is 74 units for $1,900,000, and the other is 24 units for $550,000. Also, I have mailed you info. on three other properties in addition to the 100 unit property that I faxed this AM. Let me know if you have any questions. Jeff Smith The Smith Company 9400 Circle Drive Austin, TX 78736 512-394-0908 office 512-394-0913 fax 512-751-9728 mobile jsmith@austintx.com
